reference.shortdesc: The bookevent element indicates a general event in the publication history of a book.

section.title: Usage information
section.p: This element is appropriate for specialization if the current set of specific book event types does not meet your needs. If an element already exists to describe a specific type of event, such as reviewed, edited, or approved, use that element instead.

section.title: Specialization hierarchy
section.p: The bookevent element is specialized from data. It is defined in the bookmap module.
